"use client" import { useState } from "react" import config from "../config" const Register = ({ onRegister, onNavigate }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", role: "user", }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState("") const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setError("") try { const response = await fetch(`${config.BASE_URL}${config.endpoints.register}`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }) const data = await response.json() if (response.ok) { onRegister(data.user, data.token) } else { setError(data.error || "Registration failed") } } catch (error) { setError("Network error. Please try again.") } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (
